trans-unit.source: Represents the base class from which custom expression writers must derive to write custom expressions.
trans-unit.target: 表示必须从中派生自定义表达式编写器以编写自定义表达式的基类。

trans-unit.source: The following code creates an expression that can be used in declarative conditions and rule sets.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码创建可在声明条件和规则集中使用的表达式。

trans-unit.source: The expression is named `TwoOfThree`, and takes 3 parameters, all of which must evaluate to Booleans.
trans-unit.target: 表达式名为 `TwoOfThree`，使用 3 个参数，所有这些参数的计算结果必须为布尔值。

trans-unit.source: This expression returns `true` if 2 of the 3 expressions return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 3 个表达式中的 2 个返回 `true`，则此表达式返回 `true`。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, add it to a Class Library project and reference the library from your workflow project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，请将它添加到类库项目并从工作流项目中引用该库。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" /> method to store fields and properties read by a condition or read by an action.
trans-unit.target: 要存储由条件或操作读取的字段和属性的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the expression is being read from; <see langword="false" /> if the expression is not being read from.
trans-unit.target: 如果要从表达式中读取数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果不从表达式中读取数据，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the expression is being written to; <see langword="false" /> if the expression is not being written to.
trans-unit.target: 如果写入表达式，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果不写入表达式，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The path of a field or property.
trans-unit.target: 字段或属性的路径。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reports on how the object uses fields and properties in the context type.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，报告对象如何在上下文类型中使用字段和属性。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，创建当前 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> 的深层副本。

trans-unit.source: A deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> 的深层副本。

trans-unit.source: A mutable string for the decompiled expression.
trans-unit.target: 反编译的表达式的可变字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method should append the decompiled syntax for this subexpression.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应该追加此子表达式的反编译的语法。

trans-unit.source: The parent code expression.
trans-unit.target: 父代码表达式。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to determine operator precedence, and whether this subexpression needs to be parenthesized.
trans-unit.target: 可用于确定运算符优先级和此子表达式是否需要加括号。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, decompiles the custom expression into string form.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，将自定义表达式反编译为字符串格式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> to execute the expression.
trans-unit.target: 要执行表达式的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, evaluates the custom expression.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，计算自定义表达式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionResult" /> that indicates the result of the rule execution.
trans-unit.target: 指示规则执行结果的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The expression to compare the current expression to.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前表达式进行比较的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Compares the current expression to another expression to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 将当前表达式与另一个表达式相比较，以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show that the expressions are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示表达式相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: 要管理验证过程的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the expression is being written to; <see langword="false" /> if the expression is not being written to.
trans-unit.target: 如果写入表达式，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果不写入表达式，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the expression is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，验证表达式是否配置正确且没有错误。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo" /> for the expression.
trans-unit.target: 表达式的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo" />。
